user_error_text: My PC does not turn on at all when I press the power button

âœ… Option 1: Check Power Source (VERY IMPORTANT)

ğŸ”˜ Option 2: Verify Power Supply (PSU) Switch

ğŸ’¡ Option 3: Look for Any Signs of Power

ğŸ› ï¸ Option 4: Run Startup Repair

error_name: Windows Gets Stuck on Spinning Circle During Boot
user_error_text: Windows gets stuck on the spinning circle during boot and never loads
symptoms: Windows gets stuck on the spinning circle during boot and never loads, spinning circle stuck, boot stuck on loading, Windows logo spinning forever
cause: Corrupted boot files, driver conflict, disk errors, or Fast Startup issue
step_1:
âœ… Option 1: Force Automatic Repair (Easiest)
Turn ON the PC
When you see the Windows logo / spinning dots, hold Power button to force shut down
Repeat this 2â€“3 times
You should see "Preparing Automatic Repair"
Let it complete and restart
âœ”ï¸ If Windows boots â†’ Problem fixed
step_2:
âœ… Option 2: Boot into Safe Mode (Most Effective)
Enter Automatic Repair
Click Advanced options
Go to Troubleshoot â†’ Advanced options â†’ Startup Settings

ğŸ”¹ If Safe Mode loads:
Uninstall recent drivers

Restart normally
step_3:
âœ… Option 3: Run Startup Repair

Troubleshoot â†’ Advanced options
Click Startup Repair
Select your account â†’ Enter password
Wait for repair to finish
âœ”ï¸ Very effective for boot corruption
step_4:
âœ… Option 4: Disable Fast Startup (Common Cause)
Fast Startup often causes endless spinning.
Boot into Safe Mode
Open Control Panel
Go to Power Options â†’ Choose what the power buttons do
Click Change settings currently unavailable
âŒ Uncheck Turn on fast startup
Save â†’ Restart
step_5:
âœ… Option 5: Check Disk & System Files (Advanced)
Fixes disk errors and broken system files.
Advanced options â†’ Command Prompt
Run these commands one by one:
chkdsk c: /f /r
sfc /scannow /offbootdir=C:\ /offwindir=C:\Windows
âœ”ï¸ Fixes corrupted files that stop booting
verification: Windows should boot normally without getting stuck on spinning circle
tag: Windows gets stuck on the spinning circle during boot and never loads, spinning circle stuck, boot stuck on loading, Windows logo spinning forever

step_1:

step_2:

step_3:

select vol X (Replace X with EFI volume number)
assign letter=S:
exit

âœ… Option 1: Power Drain Reset (FASTEST FIX)

Reconnect power

Reconnect CPU_FAN cable to motherboard

tag: My PC turns on but shuts down immediately after powering up, PC shuts down right after turning on, immediate shutdown after power up, computer turns off instantly
